text: Yadarakha yiniharule aphna hrdayala'i avaranale chopchan, taki allahabata tyasa bhitrako kura luka'una sakun. Sunirakha, juna bela yiniharu lugama beri'eka hunchan tyatibela pani tiniharuko lukeko ra prakata kuraharu sabaiko usala'i jnana huncha, nihsandeha u hrdayabhitra bha'eka sabai kuraharu jandacha
